info.description:
onboardingJourney Postman Collection

Each request may give varying responses based on changes in variables.  
Refer to the examples for the full range of anticipated responses.
info.name: onboardingJourney

request.description: Request the journey link to get AuthId

response.name: enterAccountData

request.description:
Manually Register Authenticator(configs for ForgeRock Authenticator ): eg. "_otpauth://totp/ERGO ID:HalgardF?secret=RLXGDIBB3HJ5YUP3FQEAQ6OHZYKLF5LQ&period=30&digits=6&b=032b75"._  
Issuer: ERGOID, Account Name: HalgardF(userName),

shared secret=_RLXGDIBB3HJ5YUP3FQEAQ6OHZYKLF5LQ , algorithm= SHA1, Oath Type =TOTP, Period=30secs._

header.value: frame-ancestors 'none'; font-src 'self' data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; default-src 'self';

response.name: successfull

request.description: Submit the Otp from the registered authenticator app
